q_ch: 产品类型是Dress的缝纫任务有哪些？
q_en: What are the sewing tasks for Dress's product type?
gt:
Sure thing! Let's dive into the sewing tasks for dresses. Here's a neat table summarizing the tasks:

| Task ID | Start Time       | End Time         | Working Group   | Planned Number | Completed Number | Status   |
|---------|------------------|------------------|-----------------|----------------|------------------|----------|
| 12      | 2024-03-27       | 2024-04-12       | Master Sewers   | 150            | 150              | Complete 😄 |
| 13      | 2024-03-27       | 2024-04-06       | Master Sewers   | 130            | 130              | Complete 😄 |
| 14      | 2024-03-18       | 2024-04-08       | Master Sewers   | 120            | 120              | Complete 😄 |
| 11      | 2024-03-21       | 2024-04-14       | Premier Sewers  | 140            | 140              | In Progress 🔄 |

Looks like the Master Sewers have been busy bees, completing all their tasks! The Premier Sewers are still working on theirs. Keep up the great work, team! 🧵✨

steps.sql: SELECT p.id FROM products p JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE pt.description = 'Dress';
steps.description: Retrieve the product IDs for products with the type "Dress"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM order_product WHERE product_id IN (5, 13, 21, 29);
steps.description: Retrieve the order_product IDs for the products identified in Step1

steps.sql: SELECT * FROM sewing_tasks WHERE order_product_id IN (14, 13, 11, 12);
steps.description: Retrieve the sewing tasks for the order_product IDs identified in Step2

response:
Sure thing! Let's dive into the sewing tasks for dresses. Here's a neat table summarizing the tasks for you:

| Task ID | Start Time          | End Time            | Working Group ID | Planned Number | Completed Number | Status     |
|---------|---------------------|---------------------|------------------|----------------|------------------|------------|
| 11      | 2024-03-21 00:00:00 | 2024-04-14 00:00:00 | 9                | 140            | 100              | In Progress |
| 12      | 2024-03-27 00:00:00 | 2024-04-12 00:00:00 | 2                | 150            | 120              | Completed   |
| 13      | 2024-03-27 00:00:00 | 2024-04-06 00:00:00 | 2                | 130            | 120              | Completed   |
| 14      | 2024-03-18 00:00:00 | 2024-04-08 00:00:00 | 2                | 120            | 120              | Completed   |

Here's a quick breakdown of the status:
- **In Progress**: The task is still ongoing.
- **Completed**: The task has been finished successfully. 🎉

If you have any more questions or need further details, feel free to ask! 😊
